event.description: Mike McCoy grounds out, shortstop Ramon Santiago to first baseman Don Kelly.
Eric Thames pops out to third baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Edwin Encarnacion called out on strikes.
Colby Rasmus singles on a fly ball to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Travis d'Arnaud flies out to center fielder Austin Jackson.
David Cooper grounds into double play, second baseman Brandon Inge to shortstop Ramon Santiago to first baseman Don Kelly. Colby Rasmus out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Adam Wilk replaces Justin Verlander.
Moises Sierra flies out to left fielder Delmon Young.
Adeiny Hechavarria flies out to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Jonathan Diaz singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Mike McCoy flies out to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Eric Thames called out on strikes.
Edwin Encarnacion flies out to left fielder Delmon Young.
Colby Rasmus doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Travis d'Arnaud grounds out, shortstop Ramon Santiago to first baseman Don Kelly.
Defensive Substitution: Quintin Berry replaces center fielder Austin Jackson, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Nick Castellanos replaces third baseman Miguel Cabrera, batting 3rd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Strieby replaces first baseman Don Kelly, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Jerad Head replaces left fielder Delmon Young, batting 5th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Omir Santos replaces catcher Alex Avila, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Joaquin Benoit replaces Adam Wilk.
David Cooper flies out to left fielder Jerad Head.
Moises Sierra doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Jerad Head.

Adeiny Hechavarria reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher Joaquin Benoit to third baseman Nick Castellanos to second baseman Brandon Inge to pitcher Joaquin Benoit to shortstop Ramon Santiago. Moises Sierra out at 3rd.
Jonathan Diaz strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Danny Worth replaces shortstop Ramon Santiago, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Eric Patterson replaces second baseman Brandon Inge, batting 9th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Phil Coke replaces Joaquin Benoit.
Mike McCoy singles on a line drive to center fielder Quintin Berry.
Eric Thames strikes out swinging. Mike McCoy steals (1) 2nd base.
Edwin Encarnacion hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball to left field. Mike McCoy scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Mike McDade replaces Edwin Encarnacion.
With Colby Rasmus batting, wild pitch by Phil Coke, Mike McDade to 3rd.
Colby Rasmus walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Anthony Gose replaces Colby Rasmus.
Travis d'Arnaud lines into unassisted double play, shortstop Danny Worth. Anthony Gose doubled off 1st.
Defensive Substitution: Matt Young replaces right fielder Brennan Boesch, batting 2nd, playing right field.
Pitcher Change: David Pauley replaces Phil Coke.
David Cooper doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Quintin Berry.
Moises Sierra grounds out, second baseman Eric Patterson to first baseman Ryan Strieby. David Cooper to 3rd.
Luis Valbuena strikes out swinging.
Ryan Goins singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jerad Head. David Cooper scores.
Chris Woodward singles on a ground ball to third baseman Nick Castellanos. Ryan Goins advances to 3rd, on throwing error by third baseman Nick Castellanos.
With Ricardo Nanita batting, Chris Woodward steals (1) 2nd base.
Ricardo Nanita flies out to left fielder Jerad Head.
Andy Dirks remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Chris Bootcheck replaces David Pauley.
Mike McDade called out on strikes.
Anthony Gose grounds out to first baseman Ryan Strieby.
Yan Gomes strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Avisail Garcia replaces right fielder Matt Young, batting 2nd, playing right field.
Rob Brantly remains in the game as the catcher.
Pitcher Change: Collin Balester replaces Chris Bootcheck.
David Cooper called out on strikes.
Moises Sierra strikes out swinging.
Luis Valbuena singles on a ground ball to right fielder Avisail Garcia.
With Ryan Goins batting, Luis Valbuena advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Ryan Goins lines out to center fielder Quintin Berry.
Austin Jackson grounds out, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Brennan Boesch grounds out, pitcher Henderson Alvarez to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Miguel Cabrera walks.
Don Kelly pops out to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria.
Pitcher Change: Andrew Carpenter replaces Henderson Alvarez.
Delmon Young doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Eric Thames.
Alex Avila grounds out, first baseman Edwin Encarnacion to pitcher Andrew Carpenter. Delmon Young to 3rd.
Ryan Raburn out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Delmon Young scores.
Ramon Santiago grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Brandon Inge pops out to second baseman Jonathan Diaz.
Austin Jackson walks.
With Brennan Boesch batting, Austin Jackson caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Travis d'Arnaud to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria.
Brennan Boesch strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Evan Crawford replaces Andrew Carpenter.
Miguel Cabrera called out on strikes.
Don Kelly grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Delmon Young strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jason Frasor replaces Evan Crawford.
Omir Santos singles on a line drive to left fielder Eric Thames.
Ryan Raburn strikes out swinging.
Ramon Santiago walks. Omir Santos to 2nd.
Brandon Inge grounds into double play, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to second baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion. Ramon Santiago out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Woodward replaces third baseman Mike McCoy, batting 1st, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Ricardo Nanita replaces left fielder Eric Thames, batting 2nd, playing left field.
Mike McDade remains in the game as the first baseman.
Anthony Gose remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Yan Gomes replaces catcher Travis d'Arnaud, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Valbuena replaces shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Goins replaces second baseman Jonathan Diaz, batting 9th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Jim Hoey replaces Jason Frasor.
Quintin Berry singles on a ground ball to center fielder Anthony Gose.
Brennan Boesch flies out to left fielder Ricardo Nanita.
Nick Castellanos singles on a line drive to center fielder Anthony Gose. Quintin Berry to 2nd.
Ryan Strieby flies out to right fielder Moises Sierra. Quintin Berry to 3rd.
Jerad Head walks. Nick Castellanos to 2nd.
Omir Santos flies out to center fielder Anthony Gose.
Pitcher Change: Jerry Gil replaces Jim Hoey.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Andy Dirks replaces Ryan Raburn.
Andy Dirks singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ricardo Nanita.
Danny Worth called out on strikes.
Eric Patterson walks. Andy Dirks to 2nd.
Quintin Berry triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Anthony Gose. Andy Dirks scores. Eric Patterson scores.
Matt Young strikes out swinging.
Nick Castellanos pops out to second baseman Ryan Goins.
Pitcher Change: Nelson Figueroa replaces Jerry Gil.
Ryan Strieby walks.
Jerad Head grounds into double play, second baseman Ryan Goins to shortstop Luis Valbuena to first baseman Mike McDade. Ryan Strieby out at 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Rob Brantly replaces Omir Santos.
Rob Brantly walks.
With Andy Dirks batting, wild pitch by Nelson Figueroa, Rob Brantly to 2nd.
Andy Dirks singles on a line drive to center fielder Anthony Gose. Rob Brantly scores. Andy Dirks to 2nd on the throw.
Danny Worth grounds out, third baseman Chris Woodward to first baseman Mike McDade.
